classification.task_goal: Categorize customer calls based on appointment scheduling and service inquiries.
primary_constraints: Select Category 1 if the customer schedules an appointment for a specific time.
Select Category 2 if the customer arrives without an appointment or agrees on an approximate time frame.
Select Category 3 if the customer inquires about availability but does not schedule.
Select Category 4 if the customer only asks about services without requesting an appointment.
Select Category 5 if the customer discusses an existing appointment.
Select Category 6 if the customer asks about the status of a vehicle being repaired or requests additional services.
Select Category 7 if the call is a general conversation unrelated to appointments or services.
classification.reasoning: The assistant initially categorized a call incorrectly (Category 2 instead of Category 1) due to misunderstanding the time frame provided by the customer. The user pointed out the error, and the assistant acknowledged it and corrected the categorization, thus repairing the constraint violation.
